descriptions:
['DescriptionThe chance to own a newly built custom  5 bedroom villa on the tip of the frond. The villa has just been completed and has never been used.
This is a unique newly built property on the tip of I frond on The Palm Jumeirah. With panoramic views to The  Dubai Marina The Crescent and the iconic Atlantis Hotel, this is a must see.
This 5 bedroom villa has just been completed and offers the ultimate in luxury living. On entering the double height front door, you are welcomed into the large open plan living and dining rooms flooded with natural light and with panoramic views of the sea and beach.  A large kitchen ensuite guest room and servants quarters complete the ground floor. Upstairs is a second family room, 1 master and 3 double bedrooms all with built in wardrobes and en-suites. Up on the second floor is a gym , shower and changing room The well-landscaped gardens boast a lovely infinity pool and pergola. There is ample garaging for 2 cars. 
Please call to arrange a private viewing.']

descriptions: ["DescriptionSilverene TowersThe residential towers house 34 floors in Tower A and 25 floors in Tower B, accommodating lively community of residents. The base of the building is also home to a captivating mix of retail tenants secured by the adept planning of the Palma Asset Management team. Retail units include a Carrefour Market, an exclusive 24,000 sq. ft. health club and an exciting mix of Sushi, Lebanese and Seafood restaurant; giving its residents a unique lifestyle.Silverene is located in Dubai Marina, possibly the world's most exclusive waterfront development, where a stylish, sophisticated lifestyle has been created to delight its residents. In between the new Marina Mall and Al Majara community, Silverene enjoys boat harbours in front of the towers and is only minutes away from one of the region\x92s largest boat harbours.Amenities include:- Large swimming pool - Sun deck and kids pool - State-of-the-art gymnasium - Retails stores on the promenade - 24 hour building security - Basement Parking - Retail outlets in the buildingPalma Real Estate mission is to deliver boutique agency services across Dubai\x92s premium real estate market including Brokerage, Consultancy and Management Services."]
